verses.name: Psalms 123:1
verses.text: Unto thee lift I up mine eyes, O thou that dwellest in the heavens.

verses.name: Psalms 123:2
verses.text: Behold, as the eyes of servants look unto the hand of their masters, and as the eyes of a maiden unto the hand of her mistress; so our eyes wait upon the Lord our God, until that he have mercy upon us.

verses.name: Psalms 123:3
verses.text: Have mercy upon us, O Lord, have mercy upon us: for we are exceedingly filled with contempt.

verses.name: Psalms 123:4
verses.text: Our soul is exceedingly filled with the scorning of those that are at ease, and with the contempt of the proud.
